quizz_info_1: Diazepam, better known by the trade name Valium, is a benzodiazepine having a sedative and anxiolytic effect. It was used to replace barbiturates, which were too addictive. The 1966 song
from the Rolling Stones is a paean to Valium launched 3 years earlier
quizz_info_2: For more details on the synthesis see: Med. Chem. Res. 2016, 25, 1538-1550.

cards.condition: 1) chloroacetyl chloride, neat; 2) NH4OH/K2CO3, neat, rt, 3 h
